mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MSGIDX, SENDID, GETID, SENDDATE, CONTENT, ISDEL, ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT MSGIDX, SENDID, GETID, SENDDATE, CONTENT, ISDEL FROM MESSAGE WHERE SENDID = #{SENDID} ORDER BY MSGIDX DESC ) ) WHERE R between #{START} and #{END}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE SENDID = #{SENDID}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MSGIDX, SENDID, GETID, SENDDATE, CONTENT, ISDEL, ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT MSGIDX, SENDID, GETID, SENDDATE, CONTENT, ISDEL FROM MESSAGE WHERE GETID = #{GETID} ORDER BY MSGIDX DESC ) ) WHERE R between #{START} and #{END}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MESSAGE WHERE GETID = #{GETID}
mapper.update: UPDATE MESSAGE SET ISDEL = 'Y' WHERE MEMIDX = #{MEMIDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE VALUES( MSGIDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{SENDID}, #{GETID}, SYSDATE, #{CONTENT}, 'N' )
